ViewsÂ¶

Views allows a seperation of visual code from instrument control code.

Views draw the graphical user interface (GUI) and handle callbacks from GUI elements when the user interacts with them. Views communicate with a model using the common.Rpc library to change the physical device state or to retrieve data. Views are the primary interface point for an operator. The purpose of views is to separate the GUI elements from the application logic.

Note

Views are not used in any of the API functions, they can only be launched in Application mode. The Application GUI will index the views folder and make them available. This is a feature that does not exist yet.
